title: 3 and Out - Peyton HOF Thoughts, Play Lance, Eagles/Deshaun Watson Watch, Defending Dan Campbell, Headlines, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Peyton HOF Thoughts, Play Lance, Eagles/Deshaun Watson Watch, Defending Dan Campbell, Headlines, Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John gives his thoughts on Peyton Manning's Hall of Fame induction this weekend, why Trey Lance needs to start for the Niners, what he's hearing from his sources about the potential for a Deshaun Watson trade, he also hits the biggest headlines from around the league, including why he thinks Dan Campbell's meathead persona is misleading and why Joe Judge running the brakes off his players will ultimately backfire. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
